com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class TextEmailMessage<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailMessage<E>
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.TextEmailMessage<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - internal representation of email using by internal client.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheMailTextEmailMessage, AWSTextEmailMessage, JavaMailTextEmailMessage, TextEmailMessageWithAttachments

    public abstract class TextEmailMessage<E>
extends EmailMessage<E>
    Base class for text only email messages.
